reviews.review_msg: I learned so much about reading development in this class that will help me as an educator! Paul is passionate about the content and believes in you. The midterm had some tricky wording, but it was not bad. His lectures are quite similar to the notes. Class could sometimes be boring, but the information was important. I still recommend him, though!

Paul is the best teacher I have had at SFU. He is so passionate about the subject. His class was practicual and interesting. I feel more confident teaching because of this course. Take this course with him if you can!

Paul is so passionate about this subject and his enthusiasm rubs off.  I loved this class, and it was the most useful course I took in the 404 semester.  The end of the year project was difficult, but so rewarding and I will use it in my career. A +++!!

This class was amazing!  I highly recommend it to all Educ 404 students.  The information was relevant, and has helped me in my career.  I wish I'd had this course before 405!  It rocked!  Paul was incredibly helpful and really gave us stuff we could use!
Awesome, awesome, awesome!  Paul's a great professor who will teach you so much relevant information!

This course has gone beyond my expectations.  Brilliant prof, really knows his stuff.  His classes are clear and organized, and I will use the things I have learned here throughout my career.  Education needs more Designs profs like him.  You will do 4 credits of work, but take this course if you can.
